org.traincontrol.base

Interface RemoteDevice<DEVICE,MESSAGE>

  • Type Parameters:
    DEVICE - the item's class
    MESSAGE - the message class
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarklinAccessory, MarklinFeedback, MarklinLocomotive

    public interface RemoteDevice<DEVICE,MESSAGE>
    This interface defines a remote device, such as a locomotive or switch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void parseMessage(MESSAGE m)
      Update state based on network message
      DEVICE syncFromNetwork()
      Synchronizes device's state based on network state
      DEVICE syncFromState()
      Transmits device's state to the network
